W1e1 1a1r1e1 1b1o1r1n1 1i1n1 1a1 1r1o1m1a1n1t1i1c1 1r1e1l1a1t1i1o1n1s1h1i1p1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1r1e2s1.1 1O1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1n1e1 1h1a1n1d1,1 1w1e1 1d1o1t1e1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1m1,1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1e1x1i1s1t1e1n1c1e1 1h1a1s1 1g1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1g1r1o1u1n1d1s1 1f1o1r1 1o1u1r1s1.1 1O1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1h1a1n1d1,1 1w1e1 1d1o1 1s1i1n1c1e1 1t1h1a1t1 1s1t1a1t1i1c1 1e1x1i1s1t1e1n1c1e1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1r1d1l1y1 1"1v1o1i1c1e1"1 1a1n1d1 1s1t1i1r1 1u1p1 1a1n1y1 1f1i1e1r1c1e1 1c1o1n1t1r1o1v1e1r1s1i1e1s1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1i1l2-1f1a1t1e1d1n1e1s2.1
2G1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1n1c1e1-1r1a1g1i1n1g1 1a1r1g1u1m1e1n1t1s1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1s1o1-1c1a1l2e1d1 1"1d1o1g1m1e1a1t1 1j1u1s1t1i1c1e1"1,1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1o1n1 1t1r1e2s1 1h1a1v1e1 1a1l1s1o1 1b1r1o1k1e1n1 1o1u1t1,1 1h1o1w1b1e1i1t1 1n1e1v1e1r1 1r1a1g1e1d1.1
2A1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1w1e1 1h1a1v1e1 1c1o1m1e1 1u1p1 1w1i1t1h1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1t1w1o1 1s1i1l1v1e1r1 1b1u1l2e1t1s1:1 1t1o1 1c1h1o1p1 1d1o1w1n1 1o1r1 1t1o1 1p1l1a1n1t1 1m1o1r1e1.1 1G1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1s1i1l1v1e1r1 1b1u1l2e1t1s1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1g1e1t1 1u1s1 1n1o1 1f1u1r1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1a1n1 1s1u1p1e1r1f1i1c1i1a1l1i1t1y1.1

2O1u1r1 1c1o1m2o1n1 1s1e1n1s1e1 1a1l1o1n1e1 1h1a1s1 1i1t1 1t1h1a1t1 1f1l1o1r1a1 1i1s1 1c1r1i1t1i1c1a1l1 1t1o1 1h1u1m1a1n1s1,1 1t1o1 1a1n1y1 1o1f1 1o1u1r1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1a1r1e1a1s1,1 1i1n1a1s1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1m1u1s1t1 1b1e1 1a1 1r1e1a1s1o1n1 1t1o1 1p1e1r1c1e1i1v1e1 1p1l1a1n1t1i1n1g1 1a1s1 1a1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1-1d1o1.1 1W1e1,1 1t1h1u1s1,1 1m1u1s1t1 1a1l1s1o1 1h1a1v1e1 1n1o1 1r1e1a1s1o1n1 1t1o1 1g1o1 1w1i1l1d1 1o1n1 1w1h1e1t1h1e1r1 1"1t1o1 1u1r1b1a1n1-1p1l1a1n1t1 1o1r1 1n1o1t1"1.1 1N1e1v1e1r1t1h1e1l1e1s2,1 1g1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1e1 1f1a1c1e1 1v1a1l1u1e1s1 1o1f1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1 1p1r1e1j1u1d1i1c1e1d1,1 1a1l1b1e1i1t1 1t1r1u1e1,1 1p1r1e1s1u1m1p1t1i1o1n1,1 1i1t1 1s1t1i1l2 1c1a1n1 1p1r1o1p1o1s1e1 1n1o1 1f1e1a1s1i1b1l1e1 1s1o1l1u1t1i1o1n1 1t1o1 1s1t1e1p1 1u1p1 1a1n1y1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1r1e1l1a1t1e1d1 1i1s2u1e1s1.1
2E1v1e1n1 1w1h1e1n1 1t1h1e1y1 1a1r1e1 1b1o1r1n1 1a1u1 1c1o1u1r1a1n1t1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1 1s1i1g1n1i1f1i1c1a1n1c1e1 1o1f1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1p1l1a1n1t1i1n1g1,1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1s1c1i1e1n1t1i1s1t1s1,1 1a1c1t1i1v1i1s1t1s1 1o1r1 1p1o1l1i1c1y1m1a1k1e1r1s1 1s1t1i1l2 1a1r1e1 1m1e1t1i1c1u1l1o1u1s1l1y1 1s1t1u1d1y1i1n1g1 1t1o1 1g1e1t1 1f1r1o1m1 1a1 1p1r1e1j1u1d1i1c1e1d1 1p1r1e1s1u1m1p1t1i1o1n1 1t1o1 1m1a1n1y1 1a1 1m1i1n1d1f1u1l1 1d1e1c1i1s1i1o1n1:1 1w1h1e1t1h1e1r1 1"1w1h1e1r1e1 1t1o1"1,1 1"1h1o1w1 1t1o1"1 1o1r1 1"1w1h1a1t1 1t1o1 1p1l1a1n1t1"1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1k1n1o1w1 1a1l2 1t1o2 1w1e1l2 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1s1t1r1u1c1t1u1r1e1s1 1a1l1w1a1y1s1 1a1r1e1 1c1o1n1v1o1l1u1t1e1d1,1 1e1n1t1a1n1g1l1e1d1 1w1i1t1h1 1l1a1y1e1r1s1 1o1f1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1i1n1f1r1a1s1t1r1u1c1t1u1r1e1s1,1 1i1n1s1t1e1a1d1 1o1f1 1p1u1r1e1l1y1 1a1 1f1l1o1r1a1.1
2I1n1,1 1c1o2r1d1i1n1a1t1e1d1 1w1i1t1h1 1J1e1a1n1-1C1l1a1u1d1e1 1A1n1t1o1n1i1n1i1 1-1 1P1r1e1s1i1d1e1n1t1 1o1f1 1A1n1g1e1r1s1 1L1o1i1r1e1 1M1Ã©1t1r1o1p1o1l1e1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1d1i1s1t1r1i1c1t1 1c1o1u1n1c1i1l1,1 1D1o1m1i1n1i1q1u1e1 1D1o1u1a1r1d1 1-1 1P1r1e1s1i1d1e1n1t1 1o1f1 1V1a1l1'1h1o1r1 1O1r1g1a1n1i1z1a1t1i1o1n1 1d1i1d1 1e1m1b1a1r1k1 1o1n1 1a1 1m1e1t1a1-1a1n1a1l1y1s1i1s1 1p1r1o1j1e1c1t1 1o1n1 1f1o1r1m1e1r1 1s1t1u1d1i1e1s1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1b1e1n1e1f1i1t1s1 1o1f1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1f1l1o1r1a1s1.1 1T1h1e1i1r1 1c1o1n1c1l1u1s1i1o1n1s1 1w1e1r1e1 1a1s1 1f1o1l2o1w1s1:1
2F1i1r1s1t1,1 1t1h1e1y1 1b1e1t2e1r1e1d1 1c1i1t1i1z1e1n1s1'1 1h1e1a1l1t1h1 1(1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1p1h1y1s1i1c1a1l1,1 1m1e1n1t1a1l1 1o1r1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1)1.1 1T1h1e1 1s1t1u1d1y1 1e1v1i1d1e1n1c1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1c1i1t1i1z1e1n1s1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1g1r1a1v1i1t1a1t1e1 1t1o1w1a1r1d1s1 1p1h1y1s1i1c1a1l1 1a1c1t1i1v1i1t1i1e1s1,1 1a1n1d1 1l1o1w1e1r1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1o1w1n1 1r1i1s1k1 1o1f1 1o1v1e1r1w1e1i1g1h1t1 1a1s1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1p1a1r1k1s1 1o1r1 1a1n1y1 1g1r1e2n1 1s1p1a1c1e1s1 1w1e1r1e1 1b1u1i1l1t1 1c1l1o1s1e1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1v1i1c1i1n1i1t1y1.1 1N1o1t1 1o1n1l1y1 1s1e1r1v1i1n1g1 1a1s1 1a1 1p1l1a1c1e1 1t1o1 1d1o1-1s1o1m1e1t1h1i1n1g1,1 1t1h1e1y1 1a1l1s1o1 1a1c1t1e1d1 1a1s1 1a1 1m1o1t1i1v1a1t1i1o1n1 1f1o1r1 1o1n1e1 1t1o1 1w1a1l1k1 1o1u1t1 1o1f1 1h1i1s1 1v1e1r1y1 1"1n1e1s1t1"1,1 1l1e1t1 1a1l1o1n1e1 1t1h1e1 1b1e1t2e1r1 1t1h1e1 1s1p1a1c1e1s1 1w1e1r1e1 1(1w1i1t1h1 1a1 1m1a1i1n1t1a1i1n1e1d1-1g1o2d1 1q1u1a1l1i1t1y1 1t1o1 1c1o1m1f1o1r1t1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1l1o1c1a1l1s1)1,1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1r1e1 1c1a1p1t1i1v1a1t1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1y1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1a1p2e1a1r1 1t1o1 1c1i1t1i1z1e1n1s1 1.1
2I1n1 1h1i1s1 1r1e1s1e1a1r1c1h1,1 1M1i1t1c1h1e1l2 1d1i1d1 1a1s1 1w1e1l2 1c1o1n1c1l1u1d1e1 1t1h1a1t1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1g1r1e2n1 1s1p1a1c1e1s1 1s1o1m1e1h1o1w1 1m1i1n1i1m1i1z1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1r1i1s1k1s1 1o1f1 1r1u1n2i1n1g1 1i1n1t1o1 1f1a1t1a1l1 1c1a1r1d1i1o1v1a1s1c1u1l1a1r1/1r1e1s1p1i1r1a1t1o1r1y1 1d1i1s1e1a1s1e1s1,1 1d1u1l2e1d1 1t1h1e1 1s1y1m1p1t1o1m1s1 1o1f1 1a1t2e1n1t1i1o1n1 1d1e1f1i1c1i1t1 1d1i1s1o1r1d1e1r1s1,1 1i1m1p1r1o1v1e1d1 1c1o1n1c1e1n1t1r1a1t1i1o1n1,1 1t1o1n1e1d1 1d1o1w1n1 1s1t1r1e1s2,1 1t1h1e1r1e1u1p1o1n1 1i1n1c1r1e1a1s1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1l1i1f1e1 1e1x1p1e1c1t1a1n1c1y1 1o1f1 1c1i1t1i1z1e1n1s1.1 1S1t1r1i1k1i1n1g1l1y1 1e1n1o1u1g1h1,1 1t1h1e1 1s1e2m1i1n1g1l1y1 1u1n1b1r1i1d1g1e1a1b1l1e1 1h1e1a1l1t1h1 1g1a1p1 1b1e1t1w1e2n1 1u1p2e1r1 1a1n1d1 1l1o1w1e1r1 1c1l1a1s2e1s1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1m1o1r1e1 1o1r1 1l1e1s2 1"1b1r1i1d1g1e1d1"1,1 1h1a1d1 1t1h1e1 1l1a1t2e1r1 1p1a1r1t1i1c1i1p1a1t1e1d1 1i1n1 1o1u1t1d1o2r1 1p1h1y1s1i1c1a1l1 1a1c1t1i1v1i1t1i1e1s1 1h1e1l1d1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1s1p1a1c1e1s1.1
2S1e1c1o1n1d1l1y1,1 1t1h1e1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1f1l1o1r1a1s1 1h1e1l1p1 1b1r1i1n1g1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1"1f1r1a1g1i1l1e1"1 1e1c1o1l1o1g1i1c1a1l1 1b1a1l1a1n1c1e1 1w1i1t1h1i1n1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1c1o1n1t1e1x1t1s1.1 1T1h1e1 1c1o1n1s1t1r1u1c1t1i1o1n1 1a1n1d1 1m1a1i1n1t1e1n1a1n1c1e1 1o1f1 1p1a1r1k1s1 1a1r1e1,1 1b1y1 1a1l2 1m1e1a1n1s1,1 1c1o1n1d1u1c1i1v1e1 1t1o1 1b1i1o1d1i1v1e1r1s1i1t1y1 1p1r1e1s1e1r1v1a1t1i1o1n1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1p1a1v1e1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1w1a1y1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1u1r1b1a1n1-1p1l1a1n1t1i1n1g1 1o1f1 1e1x1o1t1i1c1 1f1l1o1r1a1 1(1f1r1o1m1 1m1u1l1t1i1f1a1r1i1o1u1s1 1o1r1i1g1i1n1s1)1,1 1t1h1u1s1 1s1u1s1t1a1i1n1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1e1s2e1n1t1i1a1l1 1b1i1o1d1i1v1e1r1s1i1t1y1 1a1m1o1n1g1 1p1a1r1k1s1 1a1n1d1 1b1o1t1a1n1i1c1s1.1 1S1t1i1l2,1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1 1m1i1s2i1o1n1 1i1s1 1a1r1d1u1o1u1s1,1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1e1r1i1n1g1 1i1t1 1m1u1s1t1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1h1a1n1d1 1s1t1u1d1y1 1m1a1n1y1 1a1 1f1a1c1t1o1r1 1(1t1o1 1n1a1m1e1 1a1 1f1e1w1,1 1s1o1i1l1 1q1u1a1l1i1t1y1,1 1c1l1i1m1a1t1e1,1 1l1a1n1d1 1u1s1e1 1a1n1d1 1h1a1b1i1t1a1t1)1 1b1e1h1i1n1d1 1a1 1n1e1w1 1f1o1r1e1i1g1n1 1p1l1a1n1t1,1 1l1e1t1 1a1l1o1n1e1 1t1h1e1 1e1n1t1i1r1e1 1p1r1e2x1i1s1t1i1n1g1 1f1l1o1r1a1.1
2B1y1 1r1e1l1e1a1s1i1n1g1 1v1a1p1o1r1s1 1a1n1d1 1p1r1o1v1i1d1i1n1g1 1s1h1a1d1e1s1,1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1f1l1o1r1a1 1d1o1e1s1 1p1l1a1y1 1a1 1c1r1u1c1i1a1l1 1r1o1l1e1 1i1n1 1r1e1g1u1l1a1t1i1n1g1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1t1e1m1p1e1r1a1t1u1r1e1.1 1I1n1d1e2d1,1 1i1t1 1l1o1w1e1r1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1d1a1i1l1y1 1t1e1m1p1e1r1a1t1u1r1e1 1a1t1 1p1a1r1k1s1 1b1y1 1C1e1l1s1i1u1s1 1d1e1g1r1e2,1 1a1n1d1 1n1i1g1h1t1l1y1 1o1n1 1a1v1e1r1a1g1e1,1 1t1h1u1s1,1 1s1a1v1i1n1g1 1%1 1t1h1e1 1a1m1o1u1n1t1 1o1f1 1p1o1w1e1r1 1c1o1n1s1u1m1p1t1i1o1n1 1i1n1c1u1r2e1d1 1f1r1o1m1 1a1i1r1-1c1o1n1d1i1t1i1o1n1e1r1s1 1a1t1 1m1a1n1y1 1c1i1t1i1e1s1,1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1s1p1e1l1t1 1o1u1t1 1a1n1 1a1n2u1a1l1 1s1a1v1i1n1g1 1o1f1 1U1S1 1d1o1l2a1r1s1 1.1
2O1t1h1e1r1 1s1t1u1d1i1e1s1 1a1l1s1o1 1e1v1i1d1e1n1c1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1p1l1a1n1t1s1 1d1i1d1 1p1u1r1i1f1y1 1t1h1e1 1a1t1m1o1s1p1h1e1r1e1 1(1i1n1c1l1u1d1i1n1g1 1f1i1n1e1 1p1a1r1t1i1c1l1e1s1 1-1 1P1M1 2a1n1d1 1c1o1e1v1a1l2y1 1a1b1s1o1r1b1 1m1a1n1y1 1a1n1 1a1i1r1 1p1o1l2u1t1a1n1t1s1 1-1 1t1o1 1d1e1m1o1n1s1t1r1a1t1e1,1 1N1O1 1a1n1d1 1S1O1 1b1y1 1c1o1r2e1s1p1o1n1d1i1n1g1l1y1 1a1n1d1 1
2T1h1i1r1d1,1 1f1l1o1r1a1 1l1e1v1e1r1a1g1e1s1 1t1h1e1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1y1.1 1C1r1o1m1p1t1o1n1 1a1s2e1r1t1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1a1n1y1 1p1r1o1p1e1r1t1y1 1(1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1a1 1h1o1u1s1e1/1a1n1 1a1p1a1r1t1m1e1n1t1 1a1n1d1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1r1e1a1l1 1e1s1t1a1t1e1 1p1r1o1p1e1r1t1i1e1s1)1 1l1o1c1a1t1e1d1 1n1e1a1r1 1g1r1e2n1 1s1p1a1c1e1s1 1d1i1d1 1i1n1d1e2d1 1o1w1n1 1a1 1h1i1g1h1e1r1 1v1a1l1u1e1 1t1h1a1n1 1o1t1h1e1r1s1 1.1
2O1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1h1a1n1d1,1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1a1g1r1i1c1u1l1t1u1r1e1 1-1 1t1h1e1 1o1p1e1n1i1n1g1 1o1f1 1h1o1m1e1g1r1o1w1n1 1f1a1r1m1s1 1i1n1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1v1i1c1i1n1i1t1y1 1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1i1n1t1e1r1i1o1r1 1o1f1 1a1n1y1 1c1i1t1y1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1n1o1t1 1o1n1l1y1 1o1f2e1r1 1f1a1r1m1e1r1s1 1s1u1b1s1t1a1n1t1i1a1l1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1i1c1 1b1e1n1e1f1i1t1s1,1 1c1o1n1s1u1m1e1r1s1 1s1h1o1p2i1n1g1 1o1p1t1i1o1n1s1,1 1t1h1e1 1s1o1c1i1e1t1y1 1t1h1e1 1c1r1i1t1i1c1a1l1 1c1o1h1e1s1i1o1n1,1 1b1u1t1 1a1l1s1o1 1g1r1a1n1t1 1t1h1e1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1a1r1e1a1s1 1w1i1t1h1 1a1 1c1o1n1s1i1d1e1r1a1b1l1e1 1a1m1o1u1n1t1 1o1f1 1g1r1e2n1 1s1p1a1c1e1s1.1

2A1r1b1o1r1 1D1a1y1 1F1o1u1n1d1a1t1i1o1n1 1-1 1o1n1e1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1l1a1r1g1e1s1t1 1U1S1 1n1o1n1-1p1r1o1f1i1t1 1t1r1e2 1p1l1a1n1t1i1n1g1 1o1r1g1a1n1i1z1a1t1i1o1n1s1 1o1n1c1e1 1l1i1s1t1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1c1r1i1t1e1r1i1a1 1f1o1r1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1p1l1a1n2e1r1s1 1t1o1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1h1a1n1d1 1t1a1k1e1 1i1n1t1o1 1c1o1n1s1i1d1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1 1w1e1r1e1 1t1h1e1y1 1t1o1 1i1m1p1l1e1m1e1n1t1 1a1 1t1r1e2 1p1l1a1n1t1i1n1g1 1p1r1o1j1e1c1t1:1 1t1h1e1 1e1s1t1i1m1a1t1e1d1 1h1e1i1g1h1t1 1o1f1 1m1a1t1u1r1e1 1t1r1e2s1;1 1t1h1e1 1m1a1x1i1m1u1m1 1r1e1a1c1h1a1b1l1e1 1w1i1d1t1h1 1o1f1 1c1a1n1o1p1i1e1s1;1 1t1r1e2 1t1y1p1e1s1 1-1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1d1e1c1i1d1u1o1u1s1 1o1r1 1e1v1e1r1g1r1e2n1;1 1s1h1a1p1e1s1 1o1f1 1t1r1e2 1s1h1a1d1e1;1 1g1r1o1w1t1h1 1r1a1t1e1s1 1-1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1r1a1p1i1d1 1o1r1 1s1l1o1w1;1 1t1h1e1 1e1s2e1n1t1i1a1l1 1a1m1o1u1n1t1s1 1o1f1 1s1o1i1l1,1 1l1i1g1h1t1 1a1n1d1 1m1o1i1s1t1u1r1e1 1f1o1r1 1g1r1o1w1t1h1;1 1f1r1u1i1t1s1 1-1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1f1r1u1i1t1l1e1s2 1o1r1 1f1r1u1i1t1a1b1l1e1 1a1n1d1 1f1i1n1a1l2y1 1t1h1e1 1h1a1r1d1i1n1e1s2 1z1o1n1e1s1 1c1r1i1t1i1c1a1l1 1f1o1r1 1g1r1o1w1t1h1.1 1E1a1c1h1 1c1a1m1e1 1w1i1t1h1 1a1 1s1p1e1c1i1f1i1c1 1i1n1s1t1r1u1c1t1i1o1n1 1s1h1e2t1.1

2I1n1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1 1g1r1e2n1 1i1n1f1r1a1s1t1r1u1c1t1u1r1e1,1 1t1r1e2s1 1a1r1e1 1p1l1a1n1t1e1d1 1i1n1 1a1c2o1r1d1a1n1c1e1 1w1i1t1h1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1f1o1l2o1w1i1n1g1 1t1e1c1h1n1i1q1u1e1s1:1 1r1a1i1n1 1g1a1r1d1e1n1s1 1-1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1d1e1s1i1g1n1e1d1 1t1o1 1r1e1t1a1i1n1 1a1 1c1e1r1t1a1i1n1 1a1m1o1u1n1t1 1o1f1 1r1a1i1n1w1a1t1e1r1 1t1o1 1l1a1t1e1r1 1w1a1t1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1s1o1i1l1 1i1t1s1e1l1f1;1 1o1r1 1"1b1i1o1s1w1a1l1e1s1"1 1-1 1t1h1e1 1s1t1r1i1p1s1 1o1f1 1t1r1e2s1 1a1l1o1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1r1o1a1d1s1 1(1t1a1k1e1 1f1o1r1 1e1x1a1m1p1l1e1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1o1n1 1D1i1e1n1 1B1i1e1n1 1P1h1u1 1s1t1r1e2t1)1,1 1b1u1i1l1t1 1i1n1 1a1 1s1l1o1p1e1 1t1o1w1a1r1d1s1 1t1h1e1 1c1e1n1t1e1r1 1t1o1 1f1i1l1t1e1r1 1w1a1s1t1e1 1a1n1d1 1s1h1a1r1e1 1t1h1e1 1c1r1i1p2l1i1n1g1 1b1u1r1d1e1n1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1d1r1a1i1n1a1g1e1 1s1y1s1t1e1m1 1(1g1o2g1l1e1 1f1o1r1 1b1e1t2e1r1 1v1i1s1u1a1l1i1z1a1t1i1o1n1)1.1
2I1n1 1a1d2i1t1i1o1n1,1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1m1u1s1t1 1b1e1 1d1i1f2e1r1e1n1t1 1p1l1a1n1t1i1n1g1 1t1e1c1h1n1i1q1u1e1s1 1t1o1 1s1e1r1v1e1 1d1i1f2e1r1e1n1t1 1p1u1r1p1o1s1e1s1 1a1n1d1 1p1r1i1o1r1i1t1i1e1s1.1 1T1o1 1i1l2u1s1t1r1a1t1e1,1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1l1e1v1e1r1a1g1e1 1t1h1e1 1s1o1-1c1a1l2e1d1 1"1s1o1i1l1 1v1a1u1l1t1s1"1 1t1e1c1h1n1i1q1u1e1s1 1(1u1s1e1 1v1a1u1l1t1s1 1t1o1 1s1t1a1b1i1l1i1z1e1 1r1o2t1s1)1 1-1 1t1o1 1h1a1l1t1 1t1h1e1 1u1p1r1o2t1i1n1g1 1a1n1d1 1n1a1i1l1 1d1o1w1n1 1t1h1e1 1u1n1i1f1o1r1m1i1t1y1 1o1f1 1r1o2t1 1s1y1s1t1e1m1s1,1 1s1u1s1p1e1n1d1e1d1 1s1i1d1e1w1a1l1k1 1s1y1s1t1e1m1s1 1(1s1t1r1i1p1-1o1f1-1t1r1e2-1p1l1a1n1t1 1o1n1 1s1i1d1e1w1a1l1k1s1)1 1-1 1t1o1 1r1e1t1a1i1n1 1r1a1i1n1w1a1t1e1r1 1f1o1r1 1r1o2t1s1 1a1n1d1 1s1y1n1c1h1r1o1n1i1z1e1 1t1h1e1 1s1t1r1i1p1 1f1o1r1 1a1e1s1t1h1e1t1i1c1 1p1u1r1p1o1s1e1s1.1

2N1o1.1 1S1i1n1c1e1r1e1l1y1 1s1p1e1a1k1i1n1g1,1 1s1a1v1e1 1y1o1u1r1 1p1r1e1c1i1o1u1s1 1m1i1n1d1f1u1l1n1e1s2 1o1n1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1m1o1r1e1 1p1r1a1c1t1i1c1a1l1 1t1h1i1n1g1s1.1 1G1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1y1o1u1r1 1w1o1r1k1,1 1y1o1u1r1 1s1t1u1d1y1,1 1y1o1u1r1 1e1n1t1a1n1g1l1e1d1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1 1r1e1l1a1t1i1o1n1s1h1i1p1s1 1h1a1v1e1 1f1o1r1e1v1e1r1m1o1r1e1 1s1t1r1e1s2e1d1 1y1o1u1 1o1u1t1,1 1a1 1p1i1e1c1e1 1o1f1 1s1u1p1e1r1f1i1c1i1a1l1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1o1n1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1f1l1o1r1a1 1(1w1h1i1c1h1 1s1o1u1n1d1s1 1b1o1n1e1-1d1r1y1)1 1m1u1s1t1 1a1p2e1a1r1 1a1n1y1 1l1e1s2 1o1f1 1a1 1w1a1s1t1e1 1o1f1 1t1i1m1e1 1a1n1d1 1b1r1a1i1n1 1m1a1t2e1r1.1

2G1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1w1e1 1d1o1 1h1a1v1e1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1s1o1l1u1t1i1o1n1 1t1o1 1a1n1y1 1p1r1o1b1l1e1m1,1 1w1e1 1s1t1i1l2 1a1r1e1 1c1o1n1s1t1r1a1i1n1e1d1 1t1o1 1s1o1m1e1,1 1i1n1 1a1n1o1t1h1e1r1 1c1a1s1e1,1 1o1p1t1i1o1n1s1 1o1n1 1a1 1s1u1p1e1r1m1a1r1k1e1t1 1s1h1e1l1f1.1 1D1u1e1 1t1o1 1y1o1u1r1 1v1e1r1y1 1b1u1d1g1e1t1s1,1 1t1h1e1 1t1i1m1e1 1n1e2d1e1d1 1t1o1 1c1o2k1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1i1n1t1e1r1e1s1t1s1 1o1f1 1y1o1u1r1 1f1a1m1i1l1y1 1m1e1m1b1e1r1s1,1 1y1o1u1 1a1r1e1,1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1l1e1f1t1 1w1i1t1h1 1p1u1r1e1l1y1 1s1o1m1e1,1 1i1f1 1a1n1y1,1 1a1f2o1r1d1a1b1l1e1 1a1n1d1 1d1r1e1a1r1y1 1o1p1t1i1o1n1s1,1 1g1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1y1o1u1 1d1o1 1h1a1v1e1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1o1p1t1i1o1n1.1
2S1o1 1i1s1 1t1h1e1 1p1o1l1i1c1y1-1m1a1k1i1n1g1 1p1r1o1c1e1s2.1 1B1e1f1o1r1e1 1y1o1u1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1g1i1v1e1 1d1e1c1i1s1i1o1n1 1o1n1 1"1r1e1p1l1a1c1i1n1g1 1a1l2 1t1h1e1 1s1c1h1o2l1 1g1r1e2n1e1r1y1"1,1 1y1o1u1 1n1e2d1 1t1o1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1h1a1n1d1 1t1a1k1e1 1i1n1t1o1 1c1o1n1s1i1d1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1 1h1o1w1 1m1u1c1h1 1i1t1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1c1o1s1t1,1 1h1o1w1 1m1a1n1y1 1l1a1b1o1r1e1r1s1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1b1e1 1i1n1v1o1l1v1e1d1,1 1h1o1w1 1l1o1n1g1 1i1t1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1t1a1k1e1,1 1h1o1w1 1s1o1p1h1i1s1t1i1c1a1t1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1t1e1c1h1n1i1q1u1e1s1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1b1e1,1 1w1h1o1 1t1o1 1b1e1 1c1h1a1r1g1e1d1,1 1w1h1e1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1i1s1 1i1s1 1a1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1,1 1i1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1i1t1f1a1l2s1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1o1v1e1r1w1h1e1l1m1 1t1h1a1t1 1p1r1i1c1e1y1 1c1o1s1t1s1,1 1w1h1o1 1t1o1 1s1u1p2l1y1 1t1h1e1 1t1r1e2s1,1 1w1h1o1 1t1o1 1a1d1m1i1n1i1s1t1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1j1e1c1t1,1 1w1h1e1r1e1 1t1h1e1 1u1n1r1o2t1e1d1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1e1n1d1 1u1p1,1 1w1h1o1 1t1o1 1h1a1n1d1l1e1 1t1h1e1 1u1p1r1o2t1i1n1g1,1 1w1h1o1 1t1o1 1c1h1a1r1g1e1,1 1a1n1d1 1s1o1 1o1n1 1a1n1d1 1s1o1 1f1o1r1t1h1.1 1A1n1d1 1b1e1a1r1 1t1h1i1s1 1i1n1 1m1i1n1d1,1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1s1t1e1p1 1n1e2d1s1 1m1e1t1i1c1u1l1o1u1s1l1y1 1s1t1e1p2e1d1 1u1p1.1
2I1n1 1t1h1i1s1 1m1a1n2e1r1,1 1t1r1e2-1c1h1o1p2i1n1g1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1e1v1e1n1t1u1a1l2y1 1t1u1r1n1 1o1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1l1e1a1s1t1 1p1a1i1n1f1u1l1 1o1p1t1i1o1n1,1 1g1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1e1 1l1o1n1g1-1t1e1r1m1 1c1o1n1t1r1o1v1e1r1s1i1a1l1 1o1u1t1c1o1m1e1s1.1 1I1n1 1a1l2 1l1i1k1e1l1i1h1o2d1,1 1t1h1i1s1 1s1e2m1s1 1h1a1r1d1l1y1 1a1 1m1o1r1a1l1 1a1c1t1.1 1N1o1r1 1d1o1 1w1e1 1h1a1v1e1 1m1a1n1y1 1a1 1v1i1a1b1l1e1 1o1p1t1i1o1n1 1t1o1 1s1e1l1e1c1t1 1f1r1o1m1,1 1e1s1p1e1c1i1a1l2y1 1w1h1e1n1 1w1e1 1s1t1i1l2 1a1r1e1 1s1t1r1u1g2l1i1n1g1 1t1o1 1a1c2o1m1p1l1i1s1h1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1i1c1 1a1n1d1 1e1d1u1c1a1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1g1o1a1l1s1 1w1e1 1d1i1d1 1f1o1r1m1e1r1l1y1 1s1e1t1 1o1u1t1.1 1I1n1 1a1 1l1i1k1e1 1m1a1n2e1r1,1 1w1e1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1r1d1l1y1 1s1p1e1n1d1 1m1u1c1h1 1t1i1m1e1 1e1n1j1o1y1i1n1g1 1s1h1o1p2i1n1g1/1c1o2k1i1n1g1,1 1f1o1r1 1w1e1 1s1t1i1l2 1a1r1e1 1d1o1g2e1d1 1b1y1 1m1a1n1y1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1b1u1r1d1e1n1s1.1
2I1n1 1f1a1c1t1,1 1t1o1 1b1y1p1a1s2 1"1p1a1i1n1f1u1l1"1 1o1p1t1i1o1n1 1i1n1 1d1e1s1p1e1r1a1t1e1 1c1i1r1c1u1m1s1t1a1n1c1e1s1,1 1w1e1 1d1o1 1n1e2d1 1t1o1 1e1m1b1a1r1k1 1o1n1 1f1i1r1s1t1-1c1l1a1s2 1s1o1l1u1t1i1o1n1 1(1h1o1w1b1e1i1t1 1b1y1 1a1l2 1m1e1a1n1s1 1m1o1r1e1 1a1r1d1u1o1u1s1)1:1 1d1e1l1i1b1e1r1a1t1e1l1y1 1s1e1l1e1c1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1e2d1s1 1(1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1a1t2e1n1t1i1v1e1n1e1s2 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1s1u1r1v1i1v1a1b1i1l1i1t1y1 1i1n1 1r1a1i1n1 1s1e1a1s1o1n1 1m1u1s1t1 1b1e1 1t1o1p1-1l1i1s1t1e1d1 1a1b1o1v1e1 1t1h1e1 1m1a1t1u1r1e1 1a1p2e1a1r1a1n1c1e1s1 1a1n1d1 1s1c1e1n1t1s1)1;1 1a1t2e1n1t1i1v1e1 1p1l1a1n2i1n1g1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1a1p2l1i1c1a1t1i1o1n1s1 1o1f1 1a1d1v1a1n1c1e1d1 1p1l1a1n1t1i1n1g1 1t1e1c1h1n1i1q1u1e1s1.1
